allow:

feat(aumate-app): add Raycast-style command palette with system tray

- Tauri v2 + React 19 + TypeScript desktop app
- Window vibrancy with Mica effect on Windows 11
- Global hotkey (F3) to toggle command palette
- System tray with left-click toggle and right-click menu
- Tailwind CSS v4 + shadcn/ui styling
- Command palette with search, keyboard navigation, and mock commands

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

- Global hotkey (F3) to toggle command palette
